com.ibm.portal.struts.command
Class StrutsViewTilesCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.portal.struts.command.StrutsViewCommand
      com.ibm.portal.struts.command.StrutsViewJspCommand
          com.ibm.portal.struts.command.StrutsViewTilesCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
IViewCommand, java.io.Serializable
public class StrutsViewTilesCommand
extends StrutsViewJspCommand

The StrutsViewTilesCommand class is a command pattern class used to provide a mechanism to encapsulate the information needed to redisplay a view for dynamic content that uses Struts Tiles. The important piece here is that a tiles definition may have a controller tried to the JSP that needs to be invoked everytime the JSP is rendered.

Since:
5.1
See Also:
